collection.name: Socket.IO
collection.desc: Realtime application framework for Node.JS, with HTML5 WebSockets and cross-browser fallbacks support.

collection.name: Modernizr
collection.desc: A JavaScript library that detects HTML5 and CSS3 features in the user’s browser

collection.name: Underscore JS
collection.desc: A utility-belt library for JavaScript that provides support for the usual functional suspects (each, map, reduce, filter...) without extending any core JavaScript objects.

collection.name: Marionette
collection.desc: A composite application library for Backbone.js that aims to simplify the construction of large scale JavaScript applications

collection.name: Knockout JS
collection.desc: Simplify dynamic JavaScript UIs by applying the Model-View-View Model (MVVM) pattern

collection.name: CanJS
collection.desc: REST-persistable models, basic routing, string-based templating

collection.name: Spine
collection.desc: Lightweight MVC library. It is kind of modified clone of Backbone (hence the name)

collection.name: Dust
collection.desc: Dust is a JavaScript templating engine designed to provide a clean separation between presentation and logic without sacrificing ease of use

collection.name: doT.js
collection.desc: concise javascript template engine for Node.js and browsers

collection.name: EJS (EmbeddedJS)
collection.desc: concise javascript template engine for Node.js and browsers

collection.name: Chai
collection.desc: BDD / TDD assertion library for node and the browser

collection.name: RequireJS
collection.desc: A file and module loader for JavaScript

collection.name: MouseTrap
collection.desc: Simple library for handling keyboard shortcuts in Javascript
